title: fix: move Portkey gateway to custom domain to fix 524 timeouts
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Deep thoughts allowed
gist.blurb: We've moved our AI gateway to a custom domain with a longer timeout limit. Now reasoning models have plenty of time to think without getting cut off.
gist.summary: Migrated the Portkey gateway to a custom domain to increase the proxy read timeout from 100s to 600s.
gist.impact: Eliminates 524 timeout errors for long-running requests like reasoning models and large context prompts.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot reading a very long scroll, representing the ability to handle long-running tasks without interruption. The scroll extends far, showing the increased timeout limit.
